entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who is eager to help Harry. He is described as looking delighted at Harry's enthusiasm.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who is being asked by Dobby for help. He is described as having his heart racing and being enthusiastic about the idea.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's voice is heard whispering in Harry's ear, cautioning him to be reckless.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the one who gave Harry an essay to finish.

entities.name: room of requirement
entities.description: The Room of Requirement is a magical room that Dobby wants to show Harry. It is described as being important and needing proper planning.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: Harry's Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as something he was about to go get.

relationships.description: Dobby wants to help Harry and show him the Room of Requirement.
Hermione's voice is cautioning Harry not to be reckless.
Snape assigned Harry an essay to finish.
Dobby wants to show Harry the Room of Requirement.
